message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product for $9,500. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $8,800. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While your offer is appreciated, $8,800 is below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $9,200.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $8,900. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
